Uses of Class
javax.time.LocalTime

  • Packages that use LocalTime 
    Package Description
    javax.time
    The main API for dates, times, instants, and durations.
    javax.time.chrono
    Support for calendar systems.
    javax.time.jdk8
    Simulates JDK8 on JDK 7.
    javax.time.zone
    Support for time-zones and their rules.

    • Uses of LocalTime in javax.time

      Fields in javax.time declared as LocalTime 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static LocalTime LocalTime.MAX_TIME
      Constant for the local time just before midnight, 23:59:59.999999999.
      static LocalTime LocalTime.MIDDAY
      Constant for the local time of midday, 12:00.
      static LocalTime LocalTime.MIDNIGHT
      Constant for the local time of midnight, 00:00.
      static LocalTime LocalTime.MIN_TIME
      Constant for the local time of midnight, 00:00.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalTime ZoneOffsetTransitionRule.getLocalTime()
      Gets the local time of day of the transition which must be checked with ZoneOffsetTransitionRule.isMidnightEndOfDay().
